questions.question: What is the dominant color of the phone case's outer frame?
What is the general shape of the protective casing?
What appears to be the primary material of the phone case?
What is the apparent texture of the back panel of the case?
Considering the back, is the case completely opaque or transparent?
Describing the camera cut-out, what is its shape?
What color is the slightly frosted back panel of the case?
Is there a noticeable raised bezel around the phone's screen?
Does the case seem to offer any protection for the camera lenses?

Is there a visible logo or marking on the back of the case?
What is the apparent finish of the outer frame; glossy or matte?
Concerning the edges, are they sharply defined or rounded?
Judging from the image, how thick does the case appear to be?
Considering the camera cut-out, how many lenses does it accommodate?
